A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Well went to the opening night\, I loved it\, yes there are bits they could have changed but I would rate this film as probably the 3rd best behind Empire and A New Hope. The problem is that it is very hard to deliver a Star Wars film that people will wow at as we have seen numerous films and TV shows over the last 30 years that opened our imagination to sci-fi space films. For those fans who have poured cold water on it I am not sure what they wanted to see? I say go see it and if you enjoyed the others then there is no reason you will not love this as well.
